name: Chaos of the B^2
description:
Year 3394,
somewhere in the solar system...
The black box isn't a theory anymore.
Humans conducted too many experiments on it and it resulted in total chaos.
The magnetic waves were shut down, and the robots which served the humans, are losing control and starting to riot.
Tip:
First walk into the actual box , which is floating in the lab, to quit the toturial and start playing.
The black box in your lab will give you random buffs or debuffs when hit by an enemy bullet, but be careful, it's hard to hit.
(based on the theory of the black box, if some kind of matter enter's it, something random will come out of it)
